name: 8th World Congress On CANCER RESEARCH AND THERAPY Conference
content: After the grand success of seven years of cancer conference, we solicit your gracious presence at the “8th World Congress on CANCER RESEARCH AND THERAPY" (WCCRT-2023) which will be conducted during July 19-20,2023 as a hybrid event at Frankfurt, Germany and virtually. The conference will emphasize the theme “Novel Discoveries in Cancer Research & Treatment”.
